alert.note: Alert for Bradley; Calhoun; Union (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 26 at 12:21PM CDT until May 29 at 8:30AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Arkansas... Ouachita River At Thatcher L&D affecting Bradley, Union and Calhoun Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ouachita River At Thatcher L&D. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 AM CDT Friday the stage was 81.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 77.0 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 79.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 1 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Crest Time Date Ouachita River Thatcher L&D 79.0 81.1 Fri 11 AM 79.7 78.3 77.0 Falling &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
